summary: Jeddah is a bustling port city in Saudi Arabia, located on the Red Sea coast. It is the second-largest city in the country and a major commercial center. Founded centuries ago, it became important in 647 when it was chosen as a travel hub for Muslim pilgrims heading to Mecca. Today, Jeddah is still a gateway for pilgrims and has a large population of over 3.7 million people. It is known for its seafood, being near the Red Sea, and has a unique motto: "Jeddah is different."
title: Jeddah
